issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Image/instance virtualization type paravirtualized should be paravirtual

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Filtering describe images by virtualization-type does not seem to be working.

Here is describe-images showing 3 HVM images. Then describe images with filter for HVM and nothing is returned.  Finally repeat describe with filter and debug option.
{code}
[root@c-07 ~]# euca-describe-images
IMAGE	emi-abe19adf	294364539771/eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-v1	294364539771	available	private	x86_64	machine				instance-store	hvm
IMAGE	emi-bcb3d6f8	294364539771/eucalyptus-load-balancer-image-v1	294364539771	available	private	x86_64	machine				instance-store	hvm
TAG	image	emi-bcb3d6f8	eutester-created
TAG	image	emi-bcb3d6f8	size	3
TAG	image	emi-bcb3d6f8	source	http://images.walrus.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img
IMAGE	emi-e5a65ee4	294364539771/preciseservercloudimgamd64disk1img-1394739807X	294364539771	available	public	x86_64	machine				instance-store	hvm
[root@c-07 ~]# euca-describe-images --filter virtualization-type=hvm
[root@c-07 ~]# euca-describe-images --filter virtualization-type=hvm --debug

comments.body: Reproducible with AWS Java SDK too.

Fix Verified

Can filter by virtualization type now.

{code}
[root@c-07 ~]# euca-describe-images --filter virtualization-type=paravirtual
[root@c-07 ~]# euca-describe-images --filter virtualization-type=hvm
IMAGE	emi-8c63f50b	518300378599/preciseservercloudimgamd64disk1img-1395070408X	518300378599	available	public	x86_64	machine				instance-store	hvm
TAG	image	emi-8c63f50b	eutester-created
TAG	image	emi-8c63f50b	size	3
TAG	image	emi-8c63f50b	source	http://images.walrus.cloud.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/precise-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img
IMAGE	emi-eeb597be	518300378599/eucalyptus-load-balancer-image-v1	518300378599	available	private	x86_64	machine				instance-store	hvm
{code}

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.0.0
Release     : 0.0.719.20140316git6156d19e.el6
